title: The First Seal
goal: Unlock the first layer of the shard's power.
stakes_shift: The shard is not just a relic, but a gateway.

scenes.summary: The passage is filled with hallucinations drawn from the characters' darkest memories.
scenes.outcome: Kaelen relives the day he failed his first oath.

scenes.summary: Lyra sees a future where the stars are gone and the world is cold.
scenes.outcome: Lyra's motivation shifts from curiosity to survival.

scenes.summary: A stone colossus, powered by ancient star-residue, blocks the exit.
scenes.outcome: The colossus demands an oath to pass.

scenes.summary: Kaelen offers a portion of his soul to the colossus to prove his intent.
scenes.outcome: The gate opens, but Kaelen is permanently weakened.

scenes.summary: The shard reacts to the sacrifice, shedding its outer layer of glass.
scenes.outcome: The shard's inner light is revealed; it is a map.

scenes.summary: They emerge onto a high mountain ledge as the sun sets.
scenes.outcome: They see the Iron Peaks in the distance.

scenes.summary: Lyra maps the shard's projections onto the night sky.
scenes.outcome: They realize the starfall was intentional; a calling card.

scenes.summary: They spot Vane's airship approaching from the north.
scenes.outcome: The chase moves to the skies.
